data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bai, Xia, Li, Houhun (2019): Taxonomic review of the genus Herpystis Meyrick, 1911 (Lepidoptera, Tortricidae) from China, with descriptions of four new species. Zootaxa 4590 (3): 382-392, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4590.3.4|62 occurrences
